trends: There have been no other sightings in Burnham
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsFour of us were driving, blinking light caught driver's attention, we stopped the car and we saw a stationary triangular object in the sky. Many lights, green yellow red white, some oif which would go out occasionally. Did not move at all, was COMPLETELY stationary. Sat and watched it for about 10 minutes, was still there while we drove away. At first thought it was a plane, but was too low, and completely stationary, and no nearby major airports or military bases. Not helicopter, too big and was a clearly apparent triangular shape. Sorry, no photos, just reactionary audio on a mini-cassete.
Summary: Saw a triangular hovering stationary object with blinking lights
